Event.Message: Driver %2 Average Hot-Swap acquire rundown time in last log period(us):%3; Average Hot-Swap acquire rundown time(us):%4; Total rundown acquire count:%5; Total rundown acquire failure:%6;
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DriverNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="Driver" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="DriverNameLength"/> <data name="AvgServiceLockAcquisitionTimeInLastLogPeriodInMicroSeconds" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="AvgServiceLockAcquisitionTimeInMicroSeconds" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="TotalAcquisitionCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FailedAcquisitionCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Driver %2 Last Hot-Swap result:%3 (LKG phase=%4); Last Hot-Swap total time (us):%5; Last Hot-Swap pre-process time (us):%6; Last Hot-Swap acquire rundown time (us):%7; Last Hot-Swap driver callback time with rundown lock held (us):%8; Last Hot-Swap post-process time (us):%9;
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DriverNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="Driver" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="DriverNameLength"/> <data name="LastServiceStatus" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> <data name="LastServiceFinalPhase" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="LastServiceLockAcquisitionTimeTotalInMicroSeconds" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="LastServiceLockAcquisitionTimePreProcessPhaseInMicroSeconds" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="LastServiceLockAcquisitionTimeAcquireRundownPhaseInMicroSeconds" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="LastServiceLockAcquisitionTimeStalledPhaseInMicroSeconds" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="LastServiceLockAcquisitionTimePostProcessPhaseInMicroSeconds" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> </template>
